description:
Slim enough to layer and warm enough to stand alone on a cool climb or hike, this supple yet durable hoodie has you covered for a wide range of activities. The stretchy thermal fleece combines a knit exterior with a soft, brushed inner face that feels great against skin. Elongated sleeves, articulated fit and harness-friendly pocket positioning make this a great choice for shoulder season climbing and mountaineering. The fitted hood slides under a helmet for wind-blasted belays.Thermal stretch fleece fabric has an attractive knit exterior and soft brushed inner face.Elongated sleeves and underarm gussets provide full range of motion for climbing and scrambling moves.Low profile hood fits under a helmet.2 roomy side zip pockets in harness-friendly positions.Lasercut chest zip pocket is set in a contrasting nylon patch.Adjustable drawcord-cinch hem keeps drafts out.Slim fit layers well.

Slim fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material
name: MEC Rockwall Midlayer - Men's
